WRITING.TITLE: Buying Weapons
WRITING.TEXT:
Thoughts on being able to purchase weapons? I wouldn't mind spending 3 on buying an elite weapon if I had too... Waiting in hope to get the ASM1 Speakeasy will do my nut in, I could potentially be waiting months.
But if there was a way to just buy the weapon, even better? Win/Win for the developers too.. they'll be rolling in cash.

WRITING.TITLE: Adding my PS Name to my Reddit site?

WRITING.TEXT: I hate seeing Bloodshed Helmet, always comes up. It gets ignored, nautrally. But it would be nice to never see it again.

LOOL that's unreal.
Does anybody know how I can turn that into a GIF?

Test out this gun out everyone... KF5.. its a SMG, perfect for the runners. Use it until you unlock the Elite version which will have -1 Mobility, +1 Damage, +1 Range. Then add Grip, Laser and Rapid Fire. Rapid fire is oh so important. If you ever run around a corner and see an enemy, and you both fire at one another, but always die... that'll be a thing of the past. The damage increase due to the Elite version of the weapon,combined with rapid fire means by the time the enemy has fire 2 or 3 bullets at your direction, you've probably done double that to him. Its so so good.... Not perfect, obviously, but for a fast paced, deadly gun... go for this!

AT close range, KF5 + Grip + Rapid Fire = Good Game, no re.
It's a beastly gun.
Close Quarters = KF5 Elite Medium = BAL Long Range = IMR (shout out to the snipers too) lol

10/10 unreal mate. That is one of the best things I've ever seen on cod, Gwan. Must have been insane feeling seeing that happen... I noticed you paused after it happened lol
Awesome dude, nice :)

WRITING.TITLE: I've found a beast set up
